org.sbml.jsbml.validator

Class Validator

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.sbml.jsbml.validator.Validator

  •  class Validator
extends java.lang.Object
    Validates an SBML document using the SBML.org Online Validator.

    This file is adapted from libSBML by Nicolas Rodriguez

    Since:
    0.8
    Version:
    $Rev: 1968 $
    Author:
    Ben Bornstein , Akiya Jouraku , Nicolas Rodriguez

    • Method Detail

      • validateSBML

        public static java.io.InputStream validateSBML(java.lang.String filename,
                               java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> parameters)
                                        throws java.io.IOException
        Validates the given SBML filename (or http:// URL) by calling the SBML.org online validator. The results are returned as an InputStream whose format may be controlled by setting parameters.put("output", ...) to one of: "xml", "xhtml", "json", "text" (default: xml).
        Returns:
        an InputStream containing the validation results.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
